snippet: The anniversary of "The Godfather," which was released 40 years ago, is a moment to appreciate New York's centrality in American cinema. No other place compares, not by a long shot.
abstract: The anniversary of "The Godfather," which was released 40 years ago, is a moment to appreciate New York's centrality in American cinema. No other place compares, not by a long shot.

headline.main: A Day to Toast 'The Godfather,' and New York
